head.supplied: Woollondibby ¶ 21/3/90. ¶ Esteemed Baron. ¶ ¶ Of No. 145 in the enclosed parcel I could find neither flowers nor fruit in spite of long searching. The plant is found together with ¶ Nagea alpina ¶ ...

div.p: RB MSS M21, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: MS found with a specimen of Podocarpus lawrencii (MEL 695736), annotated by Bäuerlen: 'No 146, Thredbo River, Snowy Mountains, alt. 6000', Bäuerlen, March 1890'. Woollondibby

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: Von Nro 145 in mitgehendem Packet konnte ich nach langem Suchen weder Blüthe noch Frucht finden. Die Pflanze findet sich mit Nagea alpina(?) (Nro 146) zwischen Steinhäufen oder Felsengeschütt u. liegt ganz flach am Boden an.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: Mit besten Wünschen für Ihre Gesundheit verbleibe ich Ihnen stets ergeben

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
N.S.W.
MS annotation by M: 'Beantw. 26/3/90' [Answered 26/3/90]. Letter not found.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Of No. 145 in the enclosed parcel I could find neither flowers nor fruit in spite of long searching. The plant is found together with Nagea alpina (?) (No. 146) among piles of rock or scree and lies very flat close to the ground.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: With best wishes for your health I remain always your devoted

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; line-height: 0.1945in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
